message: My turn.  Let's be realistic, time is money.  This offer won't last.
Don't wait, the money won't get more valuable for you
Time is running out.  This is a very reasonable offer, take it before inflation eats into it further.
You're losing value, I'm being generous
Okay, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Don't let greed make us both lose!
Your 50/50 was close, but not quite there
This is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this now.  Take the deal!
You're losing a lot to inflation, give up now
Alice, this is insane!  We're both losing out. Take this slightly better offer and let's be done with this!
Inflation is killing your share, last chance
